data.text: Nà ɗa seɠe lɛigi loo geeɠɔlɔgi ɠɔba,
Maliɠii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI kàlagɛ ga nii maanɛai gè bo,
Maliɠii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa kàlasu ga goilogi,
Gè pòluʋɛ veeʋɛ doɠa nuiti zea,
Maliɠii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa é ɓɔsu bà,
Maliɠii ɠa kòba, toɠa nà-gaamai ve zèa.
Wɛlɛ Maliɠii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa é ɓɔsu bà,
Ta ɠa wo zaama nɛi ɓaa,
